sections.heading: 01|Uniform principal and income act definitions
sections.text: Effective:January 1, 2007Latest Legislation:House Bill 416 - 126th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections5812.01to5812.52of the Revised Code:(A) "Accounting period" means a calendar year unless another twelve-month period is

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply to every trust or decedent's estate existing on January 1, 2003, except as otherwise expressly provided in the will or terms of the trust or in sections5812
